titles.title: HP728 How can we sinners know

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How can we sinners know
Our sins on earth forgiven?
How can our gracious Saviour show
Our names inscribed in heaven?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We who in Christ believe
That he for us hath died,
We all his unknown peace receive,
And feel his blood applied.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
His love, surpassing far
The love of all beneath,
We find within our hearts, and dare
The pointless darts of death.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Stronger than death and hell
The mystic power we prove;
And, conquerors of the world, we dwell
In heaven, who dwell in love.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The meek and lowly heart
That in our Saviour was,
To us his Spirit cloth impart,
And signs us with his cross.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Our nature's turned, our mind
Transformed in all its powers;
And both the witnesses are joined,
The Spir't of God with ours.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
His glory our design,
We live our God to please;
And rise with filial fear divine,
To perfect holiness.
